author: Shawn Yuan
title: China in coronavirus propaganda push as US ties worsen
description: State media lauds China as global leader in fight against disease in bid to defuse criticism it allowed virus to spread.
content: Chengdu, China - On March 18, China marked a milestone in its "people's war" against the new coronavirus. For the first time in three months, there were no new local infections in the central province of Hubei, where more than 60 million people remain confine… [+7566 chars]
